casebody.data:
Fernwood Realty, LLC
v.
AeroCision, LLC Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2016 Jeffrey J. White, in support of the petition. Hugh D. Hughes, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 345 , 141 A.3d 965 (2016), is denied.

ROGERS, C.J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
